verbs.description: [ARG0: multiple local national officials] [V: decline] [ARG1: white house invitation to join president trump in pittsburgh] [ARGM-PRP: following synagogue shooting] multiple officials both local and national have turned down an invitation from the white house to join president donald trump in his visit to pittsburgh tuesday afternoon pittsburgh action news 4 has confirmed that pittsburgh mayor bill peduto and pittsburgh county executive rich fitzgerald turned down invitations according to abc news senate majority leader mitch mcconnell and house speaker paul ryan are unable to make the trip because white house chuck schumer donald trump senate hearst television mitch mcconnell pittsburgh pittsburgh county jim sciutto president cnn bill peduto president donald trump president trump
